@usedefault

{{Account id:$$id}}

h2. Account: ${name}

{{actions:

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/account\/disable"
input = [ "reason",]
display = "Disable"
[actions.data]
accountname = "${name}"

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/account\/enable"
input = [ "reason",]
display = "Enable"
[actions.data]
accountname = "${name}"

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/account\/delete"
input = [ "reason",]
display = "Delete"
[actions.data]
accountname = "${name}"

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/account\/addUser"
input = [ "username", "accesstype",]
display = "Add User"
[actions.data]
accountname = "${name}"

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/account\/deleteUser"
input = [ "username",]
display = "Delete User"
[actions.data]
accountname = "${name}"

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/cloudspace\/create"
input = [ "name", "location", "access", "maxMemoryCapacity", "maxDiskCapacity",]
display = "Create Space"
[actions.data]
accountname = "${name}"

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/finance\/changeCredit"
input = [ "amount", "message",]
display = "Change Credit"
[actions.data]
accountname = "${name}"

[[actions]]
action = "\/restmachine\/cloudbroker\/account\/rename"
input = [ "name",]
display = "Rename"
[actions.data]
accountname = "${name}"
}}

h3. Details
|*Account ID*|$$id|
|*Real Name*|${displayname}|
|*Location*|${DCLocation}|
|*Company*|${company}|
|*Company Site*|${companyurl}|
|*Status*|${status}|

h3. Users Access
||User Name||E-Mail||ACL||
{% for user in users -%}
    |${user.id}|${user.emails}|${user.acl}|
{% endfor %}

h3. Spaces
{{cbspaces: accountId:$$id}}

h3. Credit

h4. Transactions
{{transactions: accountId:$$id}}

h4. Balance
{{balances: accountId:$$id}}
